short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Genie updates your new tab with popular shortcuts and custom search experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with Tab Genie!

Access popular websites like Amazon, Netflix, ChatGPT, and Reddit directly from your new tab page. Whether you're shopping, streaming, or seeking information, Tab Genie ensures these sites are just a click away.

Get an updated new tab search experience with results provided by Yahoo!

By clicking "Add To Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Tab Genie extension and setting Chrome New Tab searches to Yahoo by the service and the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy.

Privacy Policy: https://tabgenie.net/privacy-policy.html
TOS: https://tabgenie.net/terms-of-service.html
